Find the remainder when $1 + 2 + 2^2 + 2^3 + \dots + 2^{100}$ is divided by 7.

$$1 + 2 + 2^2 + 2^3 + \dots + 2^{100}$$

$$= 1(1 - 2^{101})/(1 - 2) = 2^{101} - 1$$

$$= 2(2^{100} - 1) + 1$$

$$= 2(7k + 6) + 1$$

$$= 14k + 13$$

$$= 7(2k + 1) + 6$$

Therefore, the remainder is $\boxed{6}$.
Final Answer: \boxed{6}. I hope it is correct.
